thread.title: Tui’s MD to speak at next Tomorrow’s Travel Leaders event
thread.title_full: Tui’s MD to speak at next Tomorrow’s Travel Leaders event

title: Tui’s MD to speak at next Tomorrow’s Travel Leaders event
text:
Tui’s MD to speak at next Tomorrow’s Travel Leaders event 19 August 2015 Save 
Nick Longman, Tui’s UK and Ireland managing director, has been announced as the first speaker of the second Tomorrow’s Travel Leaders conference. 
The all-day event will take place at 30 Euston Square, London, on November 25, and will feature a host of industry names, as well as past and present members of TTG’s 30 Under 30, who will offer inspiration, career development tips and leadership advice to delegates. 
Young achievers from across travel are invited to attend. Take advantage of our early-bird ticket offer of £129+VAT.
